name: Ursa Polaris
movement: walking speed of 40 feet and swimming speed of 30 feet
description: Ursa Polaris is a large, imposing creature with a powerful build, covered in ice formations that glimmer in the light.
memorable: Its breathtaking display of swirling ice light can stun foes, while its freezing cold breath deals significant damage.
goals: Typically hunts for prey in snowy environments and dominates its territory.
relations: May be encountered with other cold-based monstrosities or in the presence of ice elementals.
strengths: High resilience with substantial hit points and significant physical strength.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage and possesses low intelligence.
attacks: Can make three attacks in a turn, with a powerful bite inflicting piercing and cold damage and sharp claws dealing slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Hypnotic Array creates mesmerizing light patterns that can stun and damage nearby foes.
senses: Possesses keen smell, granting advantage on perception checks related to smell.
skills: Excels in athletics and has a notable perception ability.
additional_information: Has a natural armor class of 15
Can move adeptly in both land and water
Can unleash a blast of cold damage in a cone
Stuns opponents with dazzling light patterns
test_queries: formidable icy monster with stunning abilities
large creature with cold breath attack
dangerous beast that hunts in snowy environments
powerful monstrosity immune to cold damage
creature that uses ice to mesmerize foes
